entries.journal_entry_description: Darth Vader is curious about the pilot who destroyed the Death Star. Help him satisfy that hunger for knowledge.
entries.task00_item_name: You a shard of the Force crystal
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The Dark Jedi found strong emanations of the Force from the Death Star debris. Vader immediately realizes that this is connected to Obi-wan, but is also forced to admit that the boy is somehow involved as well and directly connected to his former master. Travel to the Nightsister's Nightspider Cult Cave on Dathomir and retrieve a Force crystal from a cave there.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Travel to Tatooine to the hut in which Obi-wan lived as Ben Kenobi. Use the Force crystal in the area to investigate any lingering Force imprints in the area.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The strongest lingering echoes of the Force that you find is clearly from Obi-wan, but there is another that remains unidentified. For now.
entries.task02_message_box_text: The strongest lingering echoes of the Force that you find is clearly from Obi-wan, but there is another that remains unidentified. For now.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Darth Vader at the Emperor's Retreat on Naboo.
